name: Saikoro Side Roll
description:
Game made for GMTK 2022 with the Theme "Roll of the Dice"

The player controls a die that moves in a grid, and has to roll it to match its side with the corresponding floor tile.


Credits

The Team:
José Estevão Pinto de Oliveira (Game Design & Art)
Grégory Rodrigues (Programming & Game Design)
Stéfano Marotz Rodrigues (Soundtrack)

Free Assets:
Tree and Ground by Evgenia
Original Dice by Armor and Rum
Ruins and Grass by Comeback
Skybox by Render Knight
ToggleSwitch by Jiny
